Allan Myers is a heavy civil construction company and materials provider operating in the Mid-Atlantic region. industry trends.virtual and augmented reality: Virtual and Augmented Reality are transformative technologies in construction, offering advanced visualizations and enhancing collaboration. They are widely used for remote site inspections, immersive design walkthroughs, and real-time safety training, enabling professionals to identify issues early and optimize processes. Beyond visualizations, these technologies enhance teamwork by enabling real-time communication across dispersed teams, ultimately improving accuracy and reducing errors.
industry trends.artificial intelligence and machine lear: AI and advanced technologies are transforming the construction sector through autonomous equipment, Building Information Modeling (BIM), and augmented reality. AI algorithms optimize project scheduling, resource allocation, and risk management, enabling data-driven decisions. Drones and sensors are utilized for site surveys and monitoring, providing real-time data to improve project visibility.
industry trends.drone technology: Drones are becoming increasingly popular in construction, offering flexible project monitoring capabilities. Project managers use them for land surveillance and aerial imaging, making early project planning more efficient and safer. They create a new standard of jobsite visibility, helping to improve project management, mitigate risks, and reduce project costs. Advanced drone technology enables better 3D modeling and advanced thermal and multispectral imaging.
industry trends.sustainability and green technologies: Sustainability has become a vital component of the construction industry in 2024. Construction companies are adopting eco-friendly practices, incorporating green building materials and implementing energy-efficient technologies to reduce their environmental footprint. This push towards sustainable construction is increasingly seen as a strategic business imperative, going beyond mere regulatory compliance.
